reviewText: Bought this item thinking it would play on DVD, but it's only for a specific code and it's in a foreign country....Please don't sell this product that we can't play here in the USA.  Otherwise, ask the producer of this DVD to provide you with the proper one  to insure it works here.  Thanks!
Techniques and exercises are a good introduction but there is not a lot of explanation for real time play.  Still a good video for your library.
Playback prohibited by area limitations, is all I can get when I try to watch.
Well, my portable Sony DVD player won't play it, so I can't really say whether the content is any good. This is a common problem with training DVDs from Amazon, but I never learn.

This dvd is reasonably sound. I am really enjoying the effort that went into producing this product. I never realize that balintawak  so intricate and complex. There is a lot of information to digest here. This dvd is really handy for preparing for a seminar or reviewing after a training session.

Very great information, I trained with a balintawak group in St. Louis for a while and I had to stop because of school and work but this dvd is almost exactly like training with my old instructors and helps me show my brother how to do everything I want.
